summary.description:
ATAC-seq footprinting unravels kinetics of transcription factor binding during zygotic genome activation.

Transcription factor Occupancy prediction By Investigation of ATAC-seq Signal.

TOBIAS preimplantation data visualization, served via WIlsON (Webbased Interactive Omics visualizatioN).

TOBIAS This app provides access to the Wu et al. and Hendrikson et al. ATAC-seq datasets as analysed in the TOBIAS manuscript **Link**.

These examples use the test data provided in the TOBIAS/test_data directory, so please make sure you are in the upper TOBIAS/ directory when running the commands.

||| COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/noncoder (MPI-BN.MPG.DE), bio.tools/newt-omics (MPI-BN.MPG.DE), bio.tools/gene_array_analyzer (MPI-BN.MPG.DE), bio.tools/exon_array_analyzer (MPI-BN.MPG.DE), bio.tools/mirpipe (MPI-BN.MPG.DE)
summary.name: TOBIAS
